thread.title: BREAKING: $49+ JetBlue Airfare Sale, 2 Days Only

title: BREAKING: $49+ JetBlue Airfare Sale, 2 Days Only
text:
BREAKING: $49+ JetBlue Airfare Sale, 2 Days Only BREAKING: $49+ JetBlue Airfare Sale, 2 Days Only August 11, 2015 9:08am   
JetBlue's "The Beach is Within Reach" sale—a promotion limited to only two days—discounts sunny destinations within the U.S., the Caribbean, and Latin America. And it does so with perfect timing, as it's valid for fall flights, specifically Mondays - Fridays during September 1 - November 20. One-way flights start at $49, round-trip at $98. The sale ends at 11:59 p.m. ET on August 12. 
JetBlue prohibits travel for all destinations during September 4 - 7, and October 12; and specific ... more 
JetBlue's "The Beach is Within Reach" sale—a promotion limited to only two days—discounts sunny destinations within the U.S., the Caribbean, and Latin America. And it does so with perfect timing, as it's valid for fall flights, specifically Mondays - Fridays during September 1 - November 20. One-way flights start at $49, round-trip at $98. The sale ends at 11:59 p.m. ET on August 12. 
JetBlue prohibits travel for all destinations during September 4 - 7, and October 12; and specifically for JFK, LGA, EWR additionally during November 4 - 9.   We found the best prices for   this promotion on the airline's sale page . Pros:
